NK040(thi)017:1: // rje rin po che'i rtags bstod zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)017:2: spyi bor pha gcig dam par gsal ba'i sku las /
NK040(thi)017:3: byin rlabs me yi tsh+wa tsh+wa phrom phrom 'phros pas /
NK040(thi)017:4: gdon lus dang bcas pa thal ba bun gyi bsreg /
NK040(thi)017:5: byin rlabs rgyud la zhugs skye ba med pa'i don mngon sum rtogs par bsam na /
NK040(thi)017:6: rje bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK040(thi)017:7: bka' brgyud pa rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)017:8: dgos bka' drin can gyi byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)017:9: rje mtshan ldan bla mas lam sna drongs //
NK040(thi)017:10: gnas ya gi ya ki'i dgon pa nas //
NK040(thi)017:11: phyi skor cig bskor gnyis bskor dang gsum //
NK040(thi)017:12: phyi bskor ba lcags ri mu khyud bskor //
NK040(thi)017:13: bar bskor ba lho rgyal 'dzam bu gling //
NK040(thi)017:14: nang bskor ba deng ri'i bla bskor nas //
NK040(thi)017:15: ri mkhan pa khrod kyi gnas mchog tu //
NK040(thi)017:16: d+aak+ki nyi zla'i gdan steng nas //
NK040(thi)017:17: gnas de ru su bzhugs su ma bzhugs //
NK040(thi)017:18: gnas de ru dam pa rgya gar bzhugs //
NK040(thi)017:19: sku 'khrungs sa rgya gar yul du 'khrungs //
NK040(thi)017:20: gsung bsgrags pa bod yul dbus su bsgrags //
NK040(thi)017:21: chags phebs pa deng ri'i dgon du phebs //
NK040(thi)017:22: 'gron po phyogs ris mi mnga' ba //
NK040(thi)017:23: rje 'gro ba'i mgon po rdo rje 'chang //
NK040(thi)017:24: mi pham mgon po bcom ldan 'das //
NK040(thi)017:25: smra ba'i seng ge mtshungs pa med //
NK040(thi)017:26: dpal chen bir ba drod tshad mkhas //
NK040(thi)017:27: ar+ya de wa sgra tshad mkhas //
NK040(thi)017:28: dam pa mu steg rgyud sde mkhas //
NK040(thi)017:29: 'jam bu gling gi rgyan gcig po //
NK040(thi)017:30: bla ma brgyud pa'i brtse ba can //
NK040(thi)017:31: mnyam bzhag kun gyi snying po mdzad //
NK040(thi)017:32: sangs rgyas kun gyi sras gcig po //
NK040(thi)017:33: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i bu gcig po //
NK040(thi)017:34: 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs gnas mchog /
NK040(thi)017:35: pha der bzhugs pa la gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)017:36: der bzhugs dam pas byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)017:37: steng der lha tshogs dpungs se dpung //
NK040(thi)017:38: byin rlabs char rgyun si li li //
NK040(thi)017:39: g.yas der dpa' bo gar dang chas //
NK040(thi)017:40: dpa' bo'i bro brdung khrigs se khrig /
NK040(thi)017:41: g.yon der dpa' mo mdangs dang ldan //
NK040(thi)017:43: skabs der d+aak+ki shigs se shig /
NK040(thi)017:44: dngos grub rnam gnyis spungs se spung //
NK040(thi)017:45: mdun der dam can dpungs se dpung //
NK040(thi)017:46: 'o der gdon tshogs mya la la //
NK040(thi)017:47: rje rgyang der bzhugs na mos phyag 'tshal //
NK040(thi)017:48: mdun der bzhugs na gus phyag 'tshal //
NK040(thi)017:49: sems mos gus phyag la nye ring med //
NK040(thi)017:50: gsol ba snying gi dkyil nas 'debs //
NK040(thi)017:51: byin rlabs thugs kyi klong nas zhugs //
NK040(thi)017:52: sku yi byin rlabs lus la 'jug /
NK040(thi)017:53: lus la bde drod 'bar ba dang //
NK040(thi)017:54: lus kyi sdig sgrib dag nas kyang //
NK040(thi)017:55: lus sprul skur grol ba byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)017:56: gsung gis byin rlabs ngag la 'jug /
NK040(thi)017:57: ngag la nus pa 'bar ba dang //
NK040(thi)017:58: ngag gi sdig sgrib dag nas kyang //
NK040(thi)017:59: ngag longs sku grol bar byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)017:60: thugs kyi byin rlabs yid la 'jug /
NK040(thi)017:61: yid la nus pa 'bar ba dang //
NK040(thi)017:62: yid kyi sdig sgrib dag nas kyang //
NK040(thi)017:63: sems chos skur grol bar byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)017:64: rgyu 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum //
NK040(thi)017:65: dug gsum ngang gi zhi ru gsol //
NK040(thi)017:66: rkyen pho gdon mo gdon klu gdon gsum //
NK040(thi)017:67: gdon gsum rnam rtog yal du gsol //
NK040(thi)017:68: nad rlung mkhris bad kun 'dus pa bzhi //
NK040(thi)017:69: bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams yal du gsol //
NK040(thi)017:70: chos sku longs sku sprul sku gsum //
NK040(thi)017:71: sku gsum mngon du dbyung du gsol //
NK040(thi)017:72: gzhan don dpag med 'byung du gsol //
NK040(thi)017:73: rje der bzhugs dam pa la gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)017:74: der bzhugs dam pas byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)017:75: pha nag po chen po gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)017:77: de bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags //
NK040(thi)017:79: de 'khrul gzhi rtsad nas gcod pa'i brda' //
NK040(thi)017:80: zhabs gnyis sba bran bshib pa 'dra //
NK040(thi)017:81: de byang chub lam la bzhugs pa'i brda' //
NK040(thi)017:82: sku dmog nag la smug pa ni //
NK040(thi)017:83: de chos dbyings ngang la zhugs pa'i brda //
NK040(thi)017:84: dbu skra khams nag gyen du 'khyil //
NK040(thi)017:85: de mtho ris thar lam bsgrod pa'i brda //
NK040(thi)017:86: spyan rtsa dmar la 'khrug pa ni //
NK040(thi)017:87: stong gsum kun tu gzigs pa pa'i brda //
NK040(thi)017:88: shang rgyud ring la shang rtse rno //
NK040(thi)017:89: de theg chen gyis rgyud don rtogs pa'i brda //
NK040(thi)017:90: tshems mdog dkar la tshem rtse rno //
NK040(thi)017:91: de skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i brda //
NK040(thi)017:92: phyag sor ring la phyag sen rno //
NK040(thi)017:93: de ser sna'i mdud pa grol ba'i brda //
NK040(thi)017:95: skal ldan thugs rje 'dren pa'i brda //
NK040(thi)017:96: rje der bzhugs dam pa la gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)017:97: der bzhugs dam pas byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)017:98: rje res 'ga' nyin mtshan bar med gzims //
NK040(thi)017:99: nyin mtshan 'khor bar gzim tsa na //
NK040(thi)017:100: chos sku gnyug ma rgyun chad med pa'i brda //
NK040(thi)017:101: rje res 'ga' rten 'brel sna tshogs mdzad //
NK040(thi)017:102: rten 'brel sna tshogs mdzad tsa na //
NK040(thi)017:103: bka' 'khor gyi bar chad sel ba'i brda //
NK040(thi)017:104: rje re res smyon pa'i brtul zhugs mdzad //
NK040(thi)017:105: smyon pa'i brtul zhugs mdzad tsa na //
NK040(thi)017:106: rkyen pho gdon mo gdon 'dul ba'i brda //
NK040(thi)017:107: rje re re rgya gram srong du gzim //
NK040(thi)017:108: rgya gram srong du gzim tsa na //
NK040(thi)017:109: de theg dman zil gyis gnon pa'i brda //
NK040(thi)017:110: rje re 'ga' ras gos rkyang cig mnab //
NK040(thi)017:111: ras gos rkyang gcig mnab tsam na //
NK040(thi)017:112: bde drod lus la 'bar ba'i brda //
NK040(thi)017:113: rje der bzhugs dam pa la der bzhugs dam pas byin bdag lus ngag yid gsum mchod pa 'bul //
NK040(thi)017:114: lus la bde drod 'bar du gsol //
NK040(thi)017:115: ngag la nus pa sbar du gsol //
NK040(thi)017:116: sems la rtogs pa 'char du gsol //
NK040(thi)017:117: rje drung na bzhugs na drung phyag 'tshal //
NK040(thi)017:118: rgyang na bzhugs na rgyang phyag 'tshal //
NK040(thi)017:119: mos gus phyag la nye ring med //
NK040(thi)017:120: mkha' spyod gnas su lam sna drongs //
NK040(thi)017:121: rkyen phyi yi bar chad phyi nas sel //
NK040(thi)017:122: nang gi bar chad nang nas sel //
NK040(thi)017:123: rkyen ngan pa grogs su 'char gyur cig /
NK040(thi)017:124: 'gal rkyen mthun rkyen dag pa bsgyur du gsol /
NK040(thi)017:125: phatah pha dam pa rin po che'i rtags bstod sma
NK040(thi)017:126: ra ser pos bskul nas ma jo mos mdzad pa
NK040(thi)017:127: rdzogs so //// ma brgyud gsol 'debs bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)017:128: spyi bor ma cig lab sgron gsal ba'i sku gsung
NK040(thi)017:129: thugs las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa byung
NK040(thi)017:130: / rang gi gnas gsum du thim /
NK040(thi)017:131: sgrib gsum bag chags rnams nyi mas ba mo zhu
NK040(thi)017:132: ba ltar dag byin rlabs sems la zhugs nas 'khrul
NK040(thi)017:133: med kyi rtogs pa sems la 'char bar bsam /
NK040(thi)017:134: ma dman pa'i lus la rgyal ba'i ma //
NK040(thi)017:135: ma mi min ye shes mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)017:136: rang rig nang nas shar ba'i ma //
NK040(thi)017:137: lus srog gzan du bor ba'i ma //
NK040(thi)017:138: lus la bde drod 'bar ba'i ma //
NK040(thi)017:139: ngag la nus pa thon pa'i ma //
NK040(thi)017:140: sems la rtogs pa shar ba'i ma //
NK040(thi)017:141: bu sgo gsum gus pas gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)017:142: ma thugs rjes dgongs la byin gyis rlabs //
NK040(thi)017:143: ma lab ni sa lam gcig chod lab //
NK040(thi)017:144: sgron ni ma rig mun pa sel //
NK040(thi)017:145: ma ni 'gro ba kun gyis ma //
NK040(thi)017:146: mtshan don dang ldan ma cig ma //
NK040(thi)017:147: bu sgo gsum gus pas gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)017:148: ma thugs rjes dgongs la byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)017:149: ma rtag chad gnyis la mi 'jig pa //
NK040(thi)017:150: bka' rdzogs pa chen po'i sgo ru zhugs //
NK040(thi)017:151: theg chen gyi lam rtogs zil gyis gnon //
NK040(thi)017:152: chos lta ba dbyings su grol ba'i ma //
NK040(thi)017:153: bu sgo gsum gus pas gsol ma thugs rjes dgongs la byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)017:154: ma bying rgod rkyen gyis mi 'jig pa //
NK040(thi)017:155: chos sdug bsngal zhi byed kyi sgo ru zhugs //
NK040(thi)017:156: nyon mongs rnam rtog zil gyis gnon //
NK040(thi)017:157: chos sgom pa klong du gyur pa'i ma //
NK040(thi)017:158: bu sgo gsum ma thugs rjes ma bar chad rkyen gyis mi 'jigs pa //
NK040(thi)017:159: bdud kyi gcod yul sgo ru zhugs //
NK040(thi)017:160: log 'dren gyi gdon bgegs zil gyis gnon //
NK040(thi)017:161: chos spyod pa lam du slong ba'i ma //
NK040(thi)017:162: bu sgo gsum ma thugs ma bdag 'dzin gyis 'khrul pas mi 'jigs pa //
NK040(thi)017:163: chos du ma ro gcig sgo ru zhugs //
NK040(thi)017:164: re dog gi 'jigs pa zil gyis gnon //
NK040(thi)017:165: chos 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pa'i ma //
NK040(thi)017:166: bu sgo gsum ma thugs rjes ma 'khor ba ngan song la mi 'jigs pa //
NK040(thi)017:167: chos dge ba bcu yi sgo ru zhugs //
NK040(thi)017:168: mi dge bcu po zil gyis non //
NK040(thi)017:169: las dge sdig rang sar grol ba'i ma //
NK040(thi)017:170: bu sgo gsum ma thugs rjes ma bag chags las kyi mi 'jigs pa //
NK040(thi)017:171: chos bsdu dngos bzhi yi sgo ru zhugs //
NK040(thi)017:172: skal ldan gyis sems can zil gyis gnon //
NK040(thi)017:173: gdul bya smin grol mdzad pa'i ma //
NK040(thi)017:174: bu sgo gsum ma thugs gdon yam bdag pho mo'i bar chad sel //
NK040(thi)017:175: bgegs log 'dren 'byung po rdul du bzlog /
NK040(thi)017:176: nad 'du ba rnam bzhi gzhom du gsol //
NK040(thi)017:177: bdag mos pa'i bu la byin la byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)017:178: da lta nyid du byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)017:179: myur ba nyid du byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)017:180: rtogs pa gsha' ma rgyud la skye bar byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)017:181: phatah ma cig gsol 'debs thod smyon bsam 'grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so ////
NK040(thi)017:184: ma yum chen de yi thugs kyi sras //
NK040(thi)017:185: sku yi byin rlabs lus la zhugs pas gzi brjid che //
NK040(thi)017:186: gsung gi byin rlabs ngag la zhugs pas nus pa che //
NK040(thi)017:187: thugs kyi byin rlabs sems la zhugs pas rtogs pa che //
NK040(thi)017:188: yon tan byin rlabs zhugs pas thugs rje che //
NK040(thi)017:189: phrin las byin rlabs zhugs pas 'gro don che //
NK040(thi)017:190: rje mkhyen pa kun ldan glang lung pa //
NK040(thi)017:191: bdag dang mos pa'i bu slob la //
NK040(thi)017:192: byin gyis rlabs par mdzad du gsol //
NK040(thi)017:193: rje thog bcas bdud kyi don rtogs pas //
NK040(thi)017:194: dngos snang sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen //
NK040(thi)017:195: thog med bdud kyi don rtogs pas //
NK040(thi)017:196: nyon mongs rang sar grol ba mkhyen //
NK040(thi)017:197: dga' brod bdud kyis don rtogs pas //
NK040(thi)017:198: yon tan sems su mnyam par mkhyen //
NK040(thi)017:199: snyem byed bdud kyi don rtogs pas //
NK040(thi)017:200: 'khor ba dbyings su grol bar mkhyen //
NK040(thi)017:201: rje thams cad mkhyen pa glang lung pa //
NK040(thi)017:202: bdag dang mos pa'i bu slob la //
NK040(thi)017:203: byin gyis rlabs par mdzad du gsol //
NK040(thi)017:204: yum chen sras su gyur pa'i rigs brgyud can //
NK040(thi)017:205: lta sgom dmigs pa bral ba'i rtogs pa can //
NK040(thi)017:206: sgro 'dogs sems su chod pa'i mkhyen pa can //
NK040(thi)017:207: rgya bod hor gsum thos pa'i grags pa can //
NK040(thi)017:208: rje yon tan kun ldan glang lung pa //
NK040(thi)017:209: bdag dang mos pa'i bu slob la //
NK040(thi)017:210: byin gyis rlabs par mdzad du gsol //
NK040(thi)017:211: phatah ces sras brgyud rnams kyi byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i rnam par byung /
NK040(thi)017:212: bdag gi khar zhugs pas 'gags med gsung gi byin rlabs ngag la zhugs par bsam /
